question: 止める
sourceAnswer:
<read>とめる</read>:: to{} stop/turn-off | park | prevent/suppress-(a-cough)/hold-back-(tears)/hold-(one's-breath)/relieve-(pain) | stop-(someone-from-doing-something)/dissuade/forbid/prohibit | notice/be-aware-of/concentrate-on/pay-attention-to/remember/bear-in-mind | fix-(in-place)/fasten/tack/pin/nail/button/staple | detain/keep-in-custody
<read>やめる</read>:: to{} stop-(an-activity)/cease/discontinue/end/quit | cancel/abandon/give-up/abolish/abstain/refrain
userAnswer:
<read>とめる:</read> to{} stop-{somebody/something}: turn-off | park | prevent/suppress/hold-back | dissuade/forbid | detain
<read>やめる:</read>　to{} stop-an-activity: cease/end/quit | cancel/abandon/give-up
activeAnswer:

<read>やめる:</read>　to{} stop-an-activity: cease/end/quit | cancel/abandon/give-up
